Package io.helidon.microprofile.config

Class MpConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.microprofile.config.MpConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Config

    public class MpConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements Config
    Microprofile config wrapper of Config.

      • convert

        public <T> T convert(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Try to coerce the value to the specific type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type we expect (e.g. String, Integer or a java bean)
        Parameters:
        type - type to return
        value - string value to parse
        Returns:
        null if value is null, transformed object otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the value cannot be converted to the specified type using.
